page.title: 05ST.PAUL'S CHURCH JARROW
page.content: St.Paul's is a famous church in Jarrrow.It was founded in 685 A.D.by King Ecgfrith.The church is famous because of the work of St.Bede,who spent most of his life writing and teaching in the monastery.This year(1985)was the 1300 anniversary of St.Paul's.Many people came to visit the monastery,the main attraction being a part of the monastery which is the original building.Children from the area visited the monastery and dressed up as monks,as part of the celebrations.As a special part of the celebrations Princess Diana visited St.Paul's on Tuesday May 21st.There is also a museum close by (Jarrow Hall) where objects and various displays of the monastery can be viewed.
